it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.players

Class HumanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.players.Player
        • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.players.HumanPlayer

  • public class HumanPlayer
extends Player
    The class for the human. It extends player and it's main purpose is to override the available actions method and set a different movable distance from the alien
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio, Matteo Pagliari
